dict.string: Planetarium needs to use Speech Recognition to convert your speech into text.
Planetarium needs to access your Photo Library so that you can store a photo in it.
Planetarium needs to determine your location to display it on the map
Planetarium needs to use the microphone to record your voice while taking a video or audio
Planetarium needs to access your Photos library so that you can pick a photo!
Planetarium needs to access your camera so that you can take a photo!
